dog.phrase: A happy dog wags its tail.

cat.phrase: The cat naps in the sun.

racehorse.phrase: Running to win the big race.

camel.phrase: Two humps are better than one.

kangaroo.phrase: The baby sits in the pouch.

bird.phrase: Singing a song on a wire.

turtle.phrase: Slow and steady wins the race.

ladybug.phrase: Red with black spots brings luck.

scorpion.phrase: Watch out for the tail sting.

microbe.phrase: Too small to see with eyes.

nest_with_eggs.phrase: Waiting for the chicks to hatch.

amphora.phrase: This amphora is an ancient jar from long ago.

apple.phrase: Crunch! The red apple goes snap-snap in my mouth.

beverage_box.phrase: Poke the straw—sip, sip from the beverage box.

broccoli.phrase: Broccoli looks like a little green tree forest.

cake.phrase: Shortcake is fluffy like a sweet little cloud.

cookie.phrase: The cookie is a sweet little coin you can munch.

corn.phrase: Corn has rows of golden teeth—chomp, chomp!

custard.phrase: Custard is smooth like a sleepy pudding.

cut_of_meat.phrase: This cut of meat is ready to cook for dinner.

dango.phrase: Dango is a sweet snack on a little stick.

doughnut.phrase: The doughnut has a hole—peek through it!

spaghetti.phrase: Spaghetti noodles wiggle like silly strings.

tomato.phrase: The tomato is juicy—squish if you squeeze it.
